backend/main.mo: Motoko backend actor providing user profiles, phone checks, and conversation/message storage with authorization and blob storage mixins.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping PWA-related features to files, components, and tests with high-confidence metadata.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file listing concise summaries of key frontend components, hooks, utilities, and pages.
Markdown checklist describing steps, verification, rollback, and troubleshooting for promoting a preview build to production.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS base file defining global variables, OKLCH color tokens, and light/dark theme mappings.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point including PWA metadata, manifest link, icons, and script bootstrapping the React app.
frontend/public/manifest.webmanifest: Web App Manifest defining Vibechat's PWA metadata including names, colors, icons, category, and start URL.
frontend/public/sw.js: Service worker implementing install/activate handlers and cache-first or network-first strategies for assets and app files.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app component handling authentication state, onboarding flow, splash screen, navigation, and section rendering. Integrates service worker registration and profile setup triggers.
frontend/src/components/AppHeader.tsx: Header component showing branding, navigation buttons, and auth/profile actions with section switching and login handling.
frontend/src/components/BrandLogo.tsx: Logo component that displays an image or fallback text styling if the image fails to load.
frontend/src/components/CameraCaptureDia: Dialog for taking photos using the device camera, handling permissions, errors, switching cameras, and returning a captured file.
frontend/src/components/chat/ai/AIHelper: Bottom sheet that generates simple on-device smart reply suggestions and lets users insert them into chat input.
frontend/src/components/chat/Conversatio: Displays a conversation view with header info, message timeline, composer, and AI assistant, using participant and message data.
Renders the user’s conversation list with loading, error, and empty states, and lets users select a conversation.
frontend/src/components/chat/MessageComp: Handles composing and sending messages with text, attachments, smart replies, rewrite options, and optional WhatsApp sharing.
frontend/src/components/chat/MessageTime: Shows a scrollable timeline of messages with text, attachments, timestamps, and loading/error states, auto‑scrolling to new messages.
frontend/src/components/chat/NewConversa: Dialog UI for creating a new conversation by validating a Principal ID and invoking the create-conversation mutation.
frontend/src/components/ContactsSyncDial: Dialog for syncing contacts via contacts picker or manual input, matching users, showing results, and allowing chat initiation.
frontend/src/components/ProfileDialog.ts: Empty file placeholder for a profile dialog component.
frontend/src/components/ProfilePhotoPick: Component allowing users to select or capture a profile photo with validation, previewing, and camera dialog integration.
frontend/src/components/PWAInstallCallou: Callout prompting installation of the PWA with install button, dismiss logic, and support detection.
frontend/src/components/SplashScreen.tsx: Shows an animated splash screen that fades out after a timed delay and then triggers the onDismiss callback.
frontend/src/components/videos/mockSpons: Static list of mock sponsored video metadata used for the feed and viewer.
frontend/src/components/videos/Sponsored: Grid view displaying sponsored video cards and opening the video viewer when an item is selected.
Dialog-based viewer that shows sponsored video details with simulated playback progress and closing controls.
frontend/src/components/videos/useSimula: React hook that simulates timed playback progress with interval updates and a reset function.
frontend/src/components/WhatsAppStyleAut: Implements a multi‑step WhatsApp‑like authentication flow with phone entry, identity verification, and profile setup with photo upload.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's identity, refetching dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context, handling login, stored identities, and auth client configuration.
frontend/src/hooks/usePWAInstallPrompt.t: Provides a hook for capturing and triggering the PWA install prompt and tracking installability.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for user profile, password management, and phone number availability with Internet Identity actor integration.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles and custom CSS variables defining light and dark theme color palettes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentity provider and mounts App component.
frontend/src/pages/ChatsPage.tsx: Implements chat UI with conversation list, detail view, and new conversation dialog supporting mobile navigation.
frontend/src/pages/GroupsPage.tsx: Placeholder page displaying a coming-soon message for group conversations.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Landing screen with branding, PWA callout, and sign-in CTA.
frontend/src/pages/LivePage.tsx: Placeholder page announcing upcoming live audio/video features.
frontend/src/pages/PreLoginIntroPage.tsx: Intro screen shown before login with branding, install prompt, skip button, and sign-in CTA.
frontend/src/pages/StatusPage.tsx: Placeholder page for the future disappearing status feature.
frontend/src/pages/VideosPage.tsx: Videos page showing sponsored video feed with informational alert.
frontend/src/utils/aiRewrite.ts: Provides deterministic text rewriting with shorter, friendly, and formal modes using regex-based heuristics.
frontend/src/utils/aiSmartReplies.ts: Generates deterministic smart reply suggestions based on keyword matching and templates.
frontend/src/utils/fileBytes.ts: Validates image files and reads them into Uint8Array buffers for profile picture handling.
frontend/src/utils/onboardingStorage.ts: Stores and retrieves a flag in localStorage indicating whether onboarding has been dismissed.
frontend/src/utils/phoneNumbers.ts: Normalizes and extracts phone numbers from text or contacts, with browser API support checks.
frontend/src/utils/readFileAsBytesAny.ts: Validates image/video files and reads any allowed media file into a Uint8Array for attachments.
frontend/src/utils/registerServiceWorker: Registers a service worker in production, logs status, and handles update detection.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Handles reading, storing, and clearing URL and session parameters, including hash-based routing support.
frontend/src/utils/whatsappShare.ts: Generates WhatsApp Web share URLs and opens them in a new tab for text sharing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind CSS with custom themes, colors, fonts, plugins, and extended utilities.
project_state.json: JSON outlining Vibechat’s targeted WhatsApp-like UI, onboarding, PWA requirements, II-based authentication rules, and platform constraints. Includes architectural notes, image requirements, and a list of deployment and login issues.
